channel.title: Moma on It works
channel.description: Recent content in Moma on It works

item.title: MoMA Style Sad Plot 2.0
item.description: 1) Clean Reproducible Code library(here) library(tidyverse) library(readr) library(dplyr) library(ggthemes) library(extrafont) library(stringr) library(extrafont) moma <- read_csv("http://bit.ly/cs631-moma") moma_NA <- moma %>% drop_na(artist_gender) %>% filter(exchange != TRUE) ggplot(moma_NA, aes(x = year_acquired, fill = gift)) + geom_bar(tat="identity",position ="identity", width = 1) + labs(x = "Year Painting Acquired", y = "Number of Works Acquired") + ggtitle("How MoMA Gets Its Art: Gifts and Purchases Over Time") + scale_fill_manual(name = "Acquisition Type", labels=c("MoMA Purchased", "Gift"), values=c("black","#ff3300")) + coord_cartesian(xlim = c(1928, 2018), ylim = c(0, 80)) + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(1930, 2015, 20)) + facet_wrap(~artist_gender) + theme_tufte() + theme(panel.
